name: Ace Washington
text: Brought my daughter here for her birthday and it turned out to be a great celebration and fun evening! Family members came by and we all enjoyed the great service and the delicious food that was served.  Everything came out hott and tasting ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg R
text: The 3rd MM I've been to around the country. Same consistent good food and service. Keep it up in this Covid world!

name: Craig Sweetnam
text: In an adventurous mood, so we asked our server to surprise us. Sadie was phenomenal. The food was great, Sadie‚Äôs selections were on the spot. We even let her pick out our drinks. As cautious  and concerned as she was, we gave her the reigns ‚Ä¶More

name: Jafet Llorente
text: Very bad service.  The sandwich I ordered was supposed to have avocado which I never saw and by complaining to the waiter he never corrected the mistake.  I charged an extra kids menu on the account when I only asked for one and the ‚Ä¶More

name: K Free
text: Oh my gosh... the pizza!  We had never been to this establishment or it‚Äôs sister restaurants in other cities. We meet friends at the Aiken location and ate until we couldn‚Äôt eat anymore.  The pizza was like Boston pizza in the South! ‚Ä¶More

name: Leigh Payton
text: We went out on a boring Tuesday and had Sadie as our waitress. We told her to surprise us with our food and drink and that I was starving. She brought 2 small pizzas each with 1/2 of one of their speciality pizzas. They were delicious, the atmosphere was great, our waitress was terrific. Our Tuesday turned into a terrific Tuesday üòä

name: Don Cummins
text: I prefer this venue a lot. It has a different ambiance. The kitcen is splendid. the service is dynamic and the team is well trained. The pay is modest. I definitely recommend.

name: Kristy Brown
text: Food was good, service lacked a little.  We had a table of 6 ladies and 2 teenage girls.  Should take that long, we weren't that troublesome.

name: John Austin
text: This place is one of my favorites! Good rates, big portions and the employees are always super nice.

name: James Brann
text: We enjoy to go out. Last night we went to this delicious restaurant which we didn‚Äôt know before. We enjoyed a delightful experience there with delicious cooking and an efficient team and  a professional  cuisine. We  added this restaurant in our phone list  and we will no doubt visit again soon. We highly recommend.

name: Stanford Horne
text: The staff in Aiken are very hospitable and knowledgeable. They are always above the rest and I always have an amazing experience.

name: Justin D
text: I had mellow mushroom in myrtle Beach which made me want to try in aiken and it was the worst. Order x2 from the restaurant and they don't even make the full pizza forget ingredients and the second time it was rushed and my pizza was folded ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremy Washburn
text: Always have a great experience whether sitting at the bar enjoying a drink with friends or playing bingo on Wednesday nights. Staff is always super friendly.

name: Al Bischoff
text: Good pizza, good prices. Safe and they have outdoor seating where space is generous.

name: Mike Baker
text: Quick service, drinks refilled, bill was correct and the food was awesome!

name: Chuck Paxton
text: Clean, excellent service and value for your money. Pizza and the calzones were all fresh. Good bar and sides are very good.

name: Robin Lockney
text: The decor is awesome. Staff very friendly. The mushroom pizza is amazing. I was visiting the area and came. Here. I would highly  recommend this place.

name: Michael Nora
text: Well, I have been to all 3 mellow mushrooms in the area: Evans, Augusta, and Aiken. I was in downtown Aiken to pay a speeding ticket. Since it has been a few years since I last visited, I walked the Alley. I decided to try Mellow Mushroom. ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Croley
text: Spent $70 on pizza and it was absolutely awful! I have never had a bad meal from any Mellow Mushroom but this was the worst.

name: Kenneth Stoeppler
text: Delicious pizza and spinach dip! A must try!

name: Anne
text: Tasty food! The pizza's are so good

name: EurSubscript
text: I love Mellow Mushroom and always have. Great food, great service. All around amazing.

name: John Barron
text: I celebrated my nomination last night in this delicious restaurant. Well it was a wonderful evening and the place was undoubtedly one of the reasons for this fruitful meeting. The crew  contributed in a very nice manner, the cooking was ‚Ä¶More

name: Philip Martin
text: We love hanging out. Last night we  found this fine restaurant which friends told us about. We passed a lovely time there with superb cooking and a nice team and an impressive  cuisine. We put this venue in our phone list  and we will certainly come back very soon. We highly recommend.

name: JR Haskins
text: Good pizza. Great Beer!

name: Konner Moore
text: They offer a large variety of delicious food. I liked dining here. Staff members are always super friendly, prices are fair and the spot is always well organised.

name: Lisa Kozich
text: Had a great blue cheese burger young server was masked and took care of us and enjoyed listening to music outside on patio everyone was distanced and I felt good going today I will be back.

name: Stella Smith
text: The food is very good. Their was a mix up with the seating/to go order. We weren't told how it was done and when we brought it to their attention no one apologized for the mix up.

name: oogabooga 1237 Gorton
text: The food was terrific and the service was outstanding. Julius was our waiter, very charming. The general manager greeted us warmly with a delightful conversation about our dogs and hers. We will return next week.

name: Carie Self
text: Good pizza good location good prices

name: Tonya Gonzalez
text: Great service, atmosphere and outdoor seating. The food is great and even have alcoholic drinks for those of age of course.

name: Jon Smith
text: Always have a good experience at this particular location.

name: Tawn Edwards
text: They told us at 730 on a Saturday night that it would be 45 minute wait to get a table.  But they sat us in 10.  As usual it was the best pizza anywhere and the service was pleasant.  They were out of silverware.  That seems to be a thing on weekend nights at all MM locations we visit.

name: Keith Hooker
text: The pizza is excellent but the service is just OK. Had a pick up order misplaced and had to wait while they made it after I arrived. Most of my orders have worked as expected, though.

name: Benito Hubbard
text: They offer a great range of fresh food. I liked eating here. The employees are always very nice, rates are convenient and the place is always neat.

name: Jim Long
text: The pizza was excellent, really liked what appeared to be whole wheat crust. The simple salad was extremely well done with a nice assortment of truly fresh ingredients. Service was a little slow but they were very busy so no surprise. My ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim McCabe
text: Great food.  Waiter was great and very attentive.

name: ANDREW McCOMB
text: Fun for family (mine has three kiddos) outings in downtown Aiken!  Fast service for lunch and dinner.  Great food!  Awesome  atmosphere!

name: Joe Baumann
text: Excellent pizza and alcohol selection. Servers were quick and kind. Would definitely go here again.

name: Stephen Edge
text: Fantastic food, very friendly staff, consistently good vibes. They charge reasonable prices and the food quality is excellent. I recommend this place.

name: Ronald Silton
text: Not your traditional pizza place. Food and service is very good and as a result of the location there usually very busy. The patio in the back is great during the Summer for group meetings and get togethers.

name: Manuel Thurman
text: Very clean and convenient place. They offer big meals and for fair rates. We liked the meals a lot and the staff members were super attentive and chatty. Highly recommended.

name: Joseph Serna
text: Had a great experience in here with my girlfriend. The food comes quick and the service is just good. Prices are convenient.

name: Bestnameeva Buster
text: Fine blonde chick at the register. Hopefully this relationship will work out.

name: Michael Allen
text: Very well organised and convenient spot. They serve big meals and for economical prices. I loved the meals very much and the waiters were very welcoming and explanatory. Will definitely recommend this spot.

name: Clay Stallings
text: Great pizza and well worth the money! Now my favorite place for pizza in Aiken!

name: Rob Michael
text: As always... good food, good staff, good environment. I love when I'm able to take the time to just come in and relax while having a wonderful meal. Everyone was in high spirits and the service was top notch. I don't get to go often because of the location, but definitely one of my favorite hidden gems.

name: Michael Hayes
text:
Visited my son and daughter-in-law last August and found the Mellow Mushroom here, and loved it.
The food and especially the Hopsecutioner IPA was terrific. ‚Ä¶More

name: Samantha Pincus
text: The food and staff was great

name: TheScorpion966
text: Had the burger at a pizza joint andvit was absolutely amazing

name: Chris D
text: The buffalo chicken pizza was AMAZING! First time eating at the Mellow Mushroom. After experiencing the food, I know it wont be my last. YUM!

name: David Rule
text: The foods are gooooood

name: Cindy Fuqua
text: Waitress very rude to our party. So much so they had to give us a different waiter. He was very pleasant and a good waiter.  Manager was indifferent to large parties waiting a long time. Over half our party ordered multiple drinks and spent ‚Ä¶More

name: Amanda A
text: Always one of my favorites. The employees are always friendly and the food is always good. I decided to try something besides my usual tonight. I ordered the meatball hoagie and the house salad and it was delicious! Ashley and Jess are awesome!

name: Dave Harmon
text: Good food and drinks. Friendly service. Nice atmosphere, especially out on the patio area.

name: Kristie Walker
text: Yum....great beer. About to eat the pizza but know its gonna be great

name: Melissa Meza
text: The food was very good, the service was great ! We loved the decor

name: Douglas Hudson
text: I adore this place very much. theres a very special mood. The cuisine is exeptionaly good. the service is effective and the team is polite. The price is fair. very much recommend.

name: Phoebe McFall
text: Nate did a phenomenal job this evening. Service with a smile, very friendly attitude, went out of his way to make sure we had everything we needed before and after the food came. As I was traveling with a small child, someone holding the ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Painter
text: Awesome! Me & bae loved it!!

name: Kenneth Mckinney
text: It's a good place to eat friendly staff clean restrooms food comes at relativity quick The waitress is awesome

name: Michael Siegner
text: One of the cleanest, nicest mellow mushrooms I have been to. They have excellent gluten free options and a varied menu for items other than just pizza. This location also has a beautiful patio and a large selection of beers on tap, enhanced by an additional selection of bottles.

name: jamie androl
text: Great food and great service.

name: Christopher Groce
text: Amazing food. I had a calzone which was great. Definitely will be back.

name: Karmic Wolff
text: Absolutely love this place! All the staff and servers are great and the pizza is nothing but the best!!!

name: Chad Bauch
text: The food and atmosphere is always great here.  We eat there atleast 2 to 3 times a month.

name: Taylor Blackburn
text: Great food and great staff!

name: Gene Mohr
text: Great waitress, slow slow slow getting food.  Calzone was barely warm.  Would not recommend if you are looking for getting your food fast.   We were told that the kitchen was backed up.  Not sure why but it looked like they only had one person actually working in the kitchen.   Not sure that I would go back.

name: Gabe Mcghee
text: Had a good time at Christmas time visiting Aiken.  Very busy!

name: Christina Cannella
text: Fun atmosphere, really yummy pizza and a great beer selection, cant ask for a better date nite!

name: Richard Garcia
text: I was there with a large group but ordered my favorite pizza in the world, a 12" Mighty Meaty. Awesome. Great toppings and crust!

name: Paul Dean
text: It's not that I disliked the place,... I didn't stop to eat. I stopped to have a beer but stopped short of ordering one because the least expensive beer was a Miller Light which weighed in at $4.50. I don't care where you are in this ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Mitchell
text: Awesome food and service. A little pricey but yummy just the same.

name: Cotton Trucker
text: Enjoyed the food, young man waited on us and gave excellent service. Salad was also good....

name: Mrs Nash
text: My new favorite pizza place!  The pizza is Dee-lish-us!! It's nice to have authentic pizza as so many places are just focused on quantity and not quality.   Keep up the great work!

name: Liam Newsome
text: This pizza is phenomenal! Freshly made and always delicious. The wait staff is always prompt and nice as well. Excellent experience overall.

name: kamen lucado
text: Good food! Pizzas are always delicious and our waiter did everything to accommodate us!

name: Jean Schwartz
text: After waiting more than 30 min for our food, the pizza comes out first. Very good flavor hence the 3 stars! The Portobello appetizer came out last and stone cold, with very few greens. If this was my first time getting it, I would have just ‚Ä¶More

name: Alandria Johnson
text: Nice, casual atmosphere. Great place to come with a group of family and friends. The seating area in the restaurant that faces Park Ave is kept too cool but the temperature was adjusted once a complaint was made. I thought that was good ‚Ä¶More

name: Allen Street
text: Worst service.  Wont be back.  Food took forever.

name: Shaylene Snyder
text: Very disorganized. Bad from the start. Twenty minutes for 4 drinks (waters), hour long wait for food,  then arrived wrong  orders and cold.  Asked for the manager because  it was such a bad experience, only to be told there wasn't one. Repeat of our last experience, won't try again.

name: Tracey G
text: Great food. Service left much to be desired. Hopefully it's a fluke. Normally, the wait staff is great. This time, not-so-much. Took an unusually long time to get orders and waitress wasn't even moderately apologetic. I hope this doesn't become a trend. üòÆ

name: Shannon Meyer
text: Food was awesome, service was great

name: Leslie VanMiddlesworth
text: Pizza was good but our chicken wings weren't done all the way

name: Andrea Setter-San Miguel
text: Pizza time? This is the Chain pizza I will try! Is located at the Alley in Downtown Aiken! Great place to gather inside or outside! Their pizzas are great! Good flavor! Budget friendly! Family extra friendly! Clean & Shine! Try it out!

name: dougnoel
text: We came in the entrance off the side and sat at a booth near the bar, although it was lunch and we didnt order drinks. Service was quick, friendlt, and efficient. The meatball hoagie was excellent but could have had a little sauce and the bun overwhelmed the size of the meatballs. All in all very good.

name: Sonya Porter
text: Waitress was fabulous.  Food was delicious!

name: Daniel Campbell
text: Good stuff! Not too salty but not plain either.  Made for a great stop for local eats while visiting family.

name: Karen Seibert
text: I love the Mellow Mushroom in Mt. Pleasant, SC and expected the same of this one in Aiken. I ordered the Veggie Calzone with avocado. I could not eat it because the avocado pieces all had tough brown lining of the avocado pit! Seriously? I ‚Ä¶More

name: Marie Sills
text: Awesome vibe. Relaxing, fun atmosphere.

name: Brittany McCurley
text: Food is always good! We generally sit on the patio and the pizza usually takes a while but it makes up for the wait in nice atmosphere.

name: Khatske
text: The food was great and the drinks were superb!

name: Susan Hubbard
text: Great meatball sub. Good  service.

name: Morgan Lutz
text: Large pizzas are $25 a pop and are huge. We couldn't finish ours. Great service!!! They brought out a special birthday brownie :)

name: Alex Cavanaugh
text: Great attentive service!!

name: Antonio Duverg√© Encarnaci√≥n
text: Excellent place

name: Sherri Davis
text: Mushroom club was great. Good service.  Good place to hear music on Thursday night.

name: M G
text: Good place

name: Sheena Lavarnway
text: Was seated around 9:10, even though they close at 10pm the service was great and the food was awesome as usual.  Great job guys!

name: Calvin Zippler
text: Good food. Not crowded at lunch.

name: Candy Windsor
text: My order was wrong and the food wasn't very good.

name: Brandon Imler
text: Nothing more fun than waiting 20 minutes for a table with kids... then getting seated and then forgot about for 45 minutes. Thanks mellow mushroom for a wasted trip... left promptly afterwards...

name: Megan Carter
text: Love the Thai pizza and pretzel bites!

name: Octavis Jones
text: Waited at least an hour to get served burger & fries nd I didn't even get my bacon that I had to (add) to the end of me eating my burger. Food was pretty good nd my server was straight just the wait time

name: Molly Fraser
text: Fantastic service. We were greeted by the Manager Greg who was the nicest ever! The place was spotless, our drinks never ran dry and the food was amazing- thanks to Alley for being a fantastic bar tender ..by the way- their beer on tap was fresh and cold! Hard to find this good service nowadays!!! Cant wait to go back!!!

name: Daniel Oliphant
text: Never pic up the phone keep you on hold to long

name: Michael Savage
text: Great food and service .A+

name: One Lion
text: Good products

name: Michaela Dunkley
text: Food was great!! It was difficult to find parking and google maps took my family the wrong way.

name: Meghan Graham
text: We love Mellow Mushroom!!! Wish there was one in KS close to where we live. Every time we are in South Carolina visiting family we make a point to eat here at least once!

name: Patty Hutto
text: Best pizza. Great selection of beer on tap. Staff wonderful. Kerrie best bartender.

name: JoAnne Singletary
text: The food was delicious and the service is great.

name: David Welshans
text: Great seating.  Good salads and pizza.  Excellent service.

name: Yolanda Archuletta
text: Excellent pizza especially for those with special dietary needs

name: Karen Gordon
text: Prep for #AikenCityLimits. Coolness in The Alley

name: Ron LaFlamme
text: If you have a dog this is a great place to eat. I would say pizza joint is a 5/5

name: Don Lester
text: Great pizza great service üëåüíØüíØüíØ

name: Ed Beres
text: My wife and I are moving to Aiken next week, and we LOVE this place! Fun, upbeat, and great food and drinks@

name: Jim Sites
text: When this place isn't too busy it is a great experience. We each had the small pizza on special for $5 on Monday. Excellent and way more than we could eat. Took nearly half home.

name: Kevin ODonnell
text: Great food, staff and atmosphere

name: Wrld Trvlr
text: Great salads. Plenty of outdoor seating. Bunch of beers on tap. Service a bit slow but friendly.

name: Rodger Arnold
text: Very good food  service was great

name: Amanda Herbener
text: Had dinner here the night of the Christmas tree lighting and it was great. The pizza was fresh and had great flavor!!! Our very was very nice and helpful. Will definitely go back.

name: Laura Phoenix Jumpp
text: I've been to Mellow Mushroom more often then I care to mention. They have a large menu but the more I go the more everything seems to be very repetitive. Initially I absolutely loved the place, and I got the tie dye Pizza several times. I ‚Ä¶More

name: dianne owen
text: Great food and atmosphere!

name: Peggy Elliott
text: Great food. Bartender Daniel is a keeper.

name: Wanda Pryor
text: It was nice to sit outside with my little dog eat a slice of pizza and they even brought my fur-baby a bowl of water  my bill was $15.00 I tipped $10.00 because the pizza was amazing and the service beyond my expectations..THANK YOU

name: J Fed
text: If you like mushroom soup, you have to try here. Absolutely delicious!!!

name: Amy Gillespie
text: Cool atmosphere! Our server Barry was awesome and recommended the Buffalo chicken pizza and it was epic!!! Great list of beers and cider on tap.

name: Jeremy Cope
text:
One of our staple places for lunch or dinner
The wife and I love the dough here. The pretzel bites and bruschetta are something we get every time. Love the availability of some local SC and GA breweries and the cookies....yes please.

name: Jeffrey Hamilton
text: Excellent pizza. Nice decor. This place serves California style pizza. The regular crust is excellent.

name: Doretha Bartley
text: Delicious food and great atmosphere.

name: Ricky Wade
text: I love it it's good great atmosphere and good food

name: Barbara Smith
text:
Real good pizza

Happy birthday sweetie

name: Hope Mitchell
text: Delicious pizza, excellent atmosphere,  service was a little slow.

name: Kayla Williams
text: Delicious as always but I do wish the prices were a bit better. It has a laid back mood with great food but with high prices. Other than that, I always love it here.

name: Nicole Davis
text: The dough was a  little undercooked and the wait staff was very inattentive. It started off well but quickly went downhill. Not what you would hope for a celebratory dinner. Would give 3 stars but every other time we ate there we have been very pleased and food was done well.

name: Karen Denton
text: Busy night. Pizza was good. Waited approximately 90 minutes for the food. Two of eight  orders were messed up that came later. Interesting decor.

name: Ray Sellers
text: Pizza was under-cooked with visible gummy substance on top of the dough.  VERY little flavor. However, the Server was terrific.

name: Courtney Cooper. Neal Camens
text: Like nearly all of their locations, very good and consistent. Having grown up near the original location in Sandy Springs, GA, the taste of the "spring water" dough always takes me back. In addition to the pizza, I love the parmesan pretzels with marinara sauce

name: Kevin Brotherton
text: Over priced average pizza.  Cool theme but dominos has more flavor.

name: Brian Keller
text: We got the pizza to go. It was good pizza but I was floored 3 two topping pizzas came to $50.99. Its pricey. Thought the wait was excessive. My last complaint is the parking is horrid at this Aiken location.

name: Samantha White
text: Went in with my two boys. Our first time. We only ordered a slice of pepperoni each to go and about an hour later we had to ask about our food. A while later we are handed three slice boxes. Walking to our car we open them to find cold pizza, barely any pepperoni and I swear three shreds of cheese. Never again.

name: Victor Newman
text: Good food. Good staff. Other than one screw up on my order one time a while ago, no complaints.

name: Stealthy's Clips
text: Great calzones but they have paper straws that break in the matter of minutes.

name: Zakiyyah Stroman
text: Great mommy and me outing. We loved the location.

name: Merlin330
text: Pizza, burgers, hoagies, Beer and some desserts served in a 60's decor.  The food was good and the service was better.  A great place to eat if you're walking around downtown Aiken.

name: Maritza Cordova
text: I was waiting for a table at the patio, since it had been more than 20 min. I saw they kept sitting clients that came after me, so I got up and asked, the staff deliberety erased my name from the waiting list as I tried to get a response ‚Ä¶More

name: Otha Lawrence
text: Having a Great time With my Wife@ Aiken Hog's and Brews......!

name: stephanie francisco
text: Really great pizza, I'm from NY so I know pizza. The place is so unique inside and their food is really good. You can tell the ingredients are fresh. Their staff is also really nice.

name: Chad Wilkie
text: Good food but pricey.

name: Gary Bainton
text: The food is delicious! A wide variety of pizza options and other foods. Great selection of beer and wine. Great service and located right in downtown Aiken with all of its interesting shopping.

name: Bill Ziemek
text: Haven't been back, but after my initial 3 star review, the owner reached out to me. The fact that he\she cares enough not only to read reviews, but also to try to find out how they can improve the customer experience speaks volumes, and ‚Ä¶More

name: dorothea sease
text:
I had the jerk chicken and the Ti-tha chicken and a small pizza. It was delicious!! Great atmosphere.friendly staff
That was my first time there. I will be going back.

name: Robert Franklin
text: Love Mellow Mushroom!! Great pizza. Good selection of beer and wine.

name: Andrew Strauss
text: Ashley runs a tight ship. Great service and food

name: melissa bell
text: Love this place.  Service was great. Food was delicious.  Libations was tasty.

name: Vanessa Longoria
text: Love the pizza at mellow mushroom the food is great! And this location is a very nice area

name: Cindy Kemp
text: Pizza and salads are excellent.

name: April White Davis
text: Delicious

name: Heather Bentley
text: Took forever to get our food, all I ordered was a sandwich at lunch and it took 45 min. Hardly any other customers either. Waitress didnt even come check on us while waiting for food or refill drinks until we flagged her down. Will not be eating here ever again.

name: Fiore Piccola Chiasso
text: Very nice and relaxed environment.

name: Charlene Swails
text: Love love love Mellow Mushroom. My family's favorite pizza & the pretzels are amazing!

name: Katie Williams
text: The food was good but service was sloe

name: Don Tart
text: Great service and pizza was the bomb!

name: Solomon Price
text: Great location, you can either sit inside or outside and experience the same amount of comfort. The busy times are generally on Sundays so If you do go on a Sunday you might be waiting for an extended period of time. The staff is friendly, ‚Ä¶More

name: Brenda Woody
text: Food is always good. Staff is always over the top as fair as service.

name: Melissa P.
text: I love mellow mushroom. It has a great fun artsy atmosphere

name: Timothy O'bryan
text: I had the meatball trio with Federalist cabernet, YUMMY! With a couple of JIm Beam and coke, the total bill  was $31.00 including a well earned $3.00 tip.

name: Mike Wood
text: Very good food and service. Nice back porch area in the alley. This is the Aiken Mellow Mushroom. The one in Augusta isn't anywhere near as good as this one.

name: Jonathan Hower
text: Good and environment were both great! Service was good but we did end up waiting a fairly long time for our drinks (cocktails) but thats not a huge deal. I would definitely recommend trying this place! Also, do yourself a favor and grab a cookie on the way out!

name: Jacob Garn
text: I always get either the Holy Shiitake pie or the tofu hoagie and I'm not even vegetarian. It's that good.

name: Rindy Tietjen
text: Two girls from this place just chased me down in the alley and accused me of stealing out of their tip jar.  I tipped them 6$ after paying over $30 for one pizza and some garlic bread and then they treat me like that!   And I sat and waited ‚Ä¶More

name: Rick Berry
text: Food was great and the menu is extensive.... Much more than pizza and a lot of fun ....young crowd ..great craft beers

name: R Meneses
text: Excellent Pizza

name: Dee Dee Price 420
text: Awesome place great food if you have small kids they accommodate them with crayons with a kids menu they car color on

name: Tammy McMicken
text: Second time in 2 months take out order was wrong and pizza was terrible. Said they credited my account for the error but still waiting for the refund.  Never again, definately NOT worth what they charge.

name: Don DeWitt
text: Really good pizza place. Typical corporate pizza place but it‚Äôs still very good food. My family goes every month or 2. Great service too, if anything, we received to much attention haha. ‚Ä¶More

name: Lucia Maria Calve
text: Fantastic menu, wonderful waitress, delicious pizza and great beer selection. Whether you are vegan, or gluten free, the Mellow Mushroom will custom make a memorable pizza for you. Ordered a large to split, thinking we'd take some home. It was too delicious, so ended up eating it all!

name: John Bohler
text: Great place to hang out in the alley.

name: Anastasia Pierce
text: Pizza is delicious and the sweet tea is great. The menu has lots of options so perfect for any large groups visiting. Perfect for the family.

name: Tonya Browder
text: Good food and a great atmosphere!

name: John Gregory
text: Great pizza and atmosphere

name: scott cullum
text: Unique place to eat with great pizza

name: Leigh Corbin
text: We always have received great food at the Mellow Mushroom. The decor is intetesting, the staff is nice, it is in a good location downtown. We especially enjoy the Spinach and Artichoke Dip and the Pretzels.

name: Patricia Thornton
text: Little exspencive but a great place

name: Azelia Goldenberg
text: Inexperienced waitress but the food was very fresh and beautiful.

name: Patricia Hyland
text: Food was good. Kind of pricey for what we got.

name: Bryson Morris
text: I was very disappointed with my experience. Asked for the largest pizza size and was brought a pizza the size of a small at Pizza Joint. It was also expensive. Won't be visiting again in the near future.

name: Tom Collins
text: Food was good and efficient.  Server seemed a bit put out by having to do his job but besides that everything was good

name: Millard Griffin
text: Great service. Delicious food.

name: deborah montgomery
text: Love the food here

name: George Sich
text: Good pizza.  Friendly and competent server.

name: Allise Riney
text: Food is always GREAT but tonight our Hostess left allot to be desired.  Plenty of tables available inside where it was warm but she tried to set us outside.  We asked if we could sit inside and she proceeded to tell us it was warmer ‚Ä¶More

name: Patrick Taylor
text: Good place so far, no bad experience yet. Good food, good price, decent wait .

name: David Miller
text: Tried something new and was pleasently surprised. Service was great and the food wss great too!!

name: Tim Smart
text: We went in while on vacation visiting family the first week in August, and it was excellent. Seated quickly for lunch, server came right over and she was great, very friendly and helpful especially with the new menu. ‚Ä¶More

name: Arsalan Kouser
text: Since I moved to Aiken this past semester, I ordered pizza from them several times over the semester.  The Holy Shiitake Pie is amazing; their other pizzas are good, too.  The service is great, too.  It's pricey, but worth it.
